title: Help identifying Monospaced gridnik style font.. from Wired
content:
Can anyone ID this font from the latest issue of Wired?

Thanks.  
J

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [photo.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016034009/http:/typophile.com/files/photo_38.JPG) | 77.59 KB |
author: typ01134

comments.content: According to [this PDF](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016034009/http:/www.wired.com/images/press/pdf/avatarCameron.pdf), that should be TrickMono. Even after further investigation, I wasn't able to get any more information on this TrickMono (may be a bespoke typeface designed by Hoefler & Frere Jones as almost everything at Wired Magazine).

thanks.. ill dig further to see if i can find it

Cheers  
J
